data: Query Functions are operators that access a wide variety of information. They can return simple true or false values (1.0 or 0.0) or more complex data. See the list of functions below for per-query documentation. Query Functions might not take any parameters. In that case, just `query.function_name` is used. Otherwise parentheses with commas separating arguments should be used, ie `query.function_name(1, 2, 'three')`.
The list below only includes Entity Queries that are live. You can view a list of [Experimental Entity Queries](ExperimentalQueryFunctions.md) by clicking the hyperlink.

data.Name: query.above_top_solid
data.Description: Returns the height of the block immediately above the highest solid block at the input (x,z) position

data.Name: query.actor_count
data.Description: Returns the number of actors rendered in the last frame

data.Name: query.all
data.Description: Requires at least 3 arguments. Evaluates the first argument, then returns 1.0 if all of the following arguments evaluate to the same value as the first. Otherwise it returns 0.0.

data.Name: query.all_animations_finished
data.Description: Only valid in an animation controller.  Returns 1.0 if all animations in the current animation controller state have played through at least once, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.all_tags
data.Description: Returns if the item or block has all of the tags specified

data.Name: query.anim_time
data.Description: Returns the time in seconds since the current animation started, else 0.0 if not called within an animation

data.Name: query.any
data.Description: Requires at least 3 arguments. Evaluates the first argument, then returns 1.0 if any of the following arguments evaluate to the same value as the first. Otherwise it returns 0.0.

data.Name: query.any_animation_finished
data.Description: Only valid in an animation controller.  Returns 1.0 if any animation in the current animation controller state has played through at least once, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.any_tag
data.Description: Returns if the item or block has any of the tags specified

data.Name: query.approx_eq
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if all of the arguments are within 0.000000 of each other, else 0.0

data.Name: query.armor_color_slot
data.Description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the color of the armor in the requested slot

data.Name: query.armor_material_slot
data.Description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the armor material type in the requested armor slot

data.Name: query.armor_texture_slot
data.Description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the texture type of the requested slot

data.Name: query.average_frame_time
data.Description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the average frame time over the last 'n' frames.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.average_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.average_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.average_frame_time(1)' will return the average frame time of the previous two frames.  Currently we store the history of the last 30 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Asking for more frames will result in only sampling the number of frames stored.

data.Name: query.block_face
data.Description: Returns the block face for this (only valid for certain triggers such as placing blocks, or interacting with block) (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).

data.Name: query.block_property
data.Description: Returns the value of the associated Blocks Block State

data.Name: query.blocking
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is blocking, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.body_x_rotation
data.Description: Returns the body pitch rotation if called on an actor, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.body_y_rotation
data.Description: Returns the body yaw rotation if called on an actor, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.bone_aabb
data.Description: Returns the axis aligned bounding box of a bone as a struct with members '.min', '.max', along with '.x', '.y', and '.z' values for each.

data.Name: query.bone_origin
data.Description: Returns the initial (from the .geo) pivot of a bone as a struct with members '.x', '.y', and '.z'.

data.Name: query.bone_rotation
data.Description: Returns the initial (from the .geo) rotation of a bone as a struct with members '.x', '.y', and '.z' in degrees.

data.Name: query.camera_distance_range_lerp
data.Description: Takes two distances (any order) and return a number from 0 to 1 based on the camera distance between the two ranges clamped to that range.  For example, 'query.camera_distance_range_lerp(10, 20)' will return 0 for any distance less than or equal to 10, 0.2 for a distance of 12, 0.5 for 15, and 1 for 20 or greater.  If you pass in (20, 10), a distance of 20 will return 0.0

data.Name: query.camera_rotation
data.Description: Returns the rotation of the camera.  Requires one argument representing the rotation axis you would like (0 for x, 1 for y)

data.Name: query.can_climb
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can climb, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.can_damage_nearby_mobs
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can damage nearby mobs, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.can_fly
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can fly, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.can_power_jump
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can power jump, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.can_swim
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can swim, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.can_walk
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can walk, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.cape_flap_amount
data.Description: returns value between 0.0 and 1.0 with 0.0 meaning cape is fully down and 1.0 is cape is fully up

data.Name: query.cardinal_block_face_placed_on
data.Description: DEPRECATED (please use query.block_face instead) Returns the block face for this (only valid for on_placed_by_player trigger) (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).

data.Name: query.cardinal_facing
data.Description: Returns the current facing of the player (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).

data.Name: query.cardinal_facing_2d
data.Description: Returns the current facing of the player ignoring up/down part of the direction (North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).

data.Name: query.cardinal_player_facing
data.Description: Returns the current facing of the player (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).

data.Name: query.combine_entities
data.Description: Combines any valid entity references from all arguments into a single array.  Note that order is not preserved, and duplicates and invalid values are removed.

data.Name: query.count
data.Description: Counts the number of things passed to it (arrays are counted as the number of elements they contain; non-arrays count as 1).

data.Name: query.current_squish_value
data.Description: Returns the squish value for the current entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense

data.Name: query.day
data.Description: Returns the day of the current level.

data.Name: query.death_ticks
data.Description: Returns the elapsed ticks since the mob started dying.

data.Name: query.debug_output
data.Description: debug log a value to the output debug window for builds that have one

data.Name: query.delta_time
data.Description: Returns the time in seconds since the previous frame

data.Name: query.distance_from_camera
data.Description: Returns the distance of the root of this actor or particle emitter from the camera

data.Name: query.effect_emitter_count
data.Description: Returns the total number of active emitters of the callee's particle effect type

data.Name: query.effect_particle_count
data.Description: Returns the total number of active particles of the callee's particle effect type

data.Name: query.equipment_count
data.Description: returns the equipment count for an actor

data.Name: query.equipped_item_all_tags
data.Description: takes a slot name followed by any tag you want to check for in the form of 'tag_name' and returns 1 if all of the tags are on that equipped item, 0 otherwise

data.Name: query.equipped_item_any_tag
data.Description: takes a slot name followed by any tag you want to check for in the form of 'tag_name' and returns 0 if none of the tags are on that equipped item or 1 if at least 1 tag exists

data.Name: query.equipped_item_is_attachable
data.Description: Takes the desired hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns whether the item is an attachable or not.

data.Name: query.eye_target_x_rotation
data.Description: returns the X eye rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.eye_target_y_rotation
data.Description: returns the Y eye rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.facing_target_to_range_attack
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is attacking from range (i.e. minecraft:behavior.ranged_attack), else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.frame_alpha
data.Description: Returns the ratio (from 0 to 1) of how much between AI ticks this frame is being rendered

data.Name: query.get_actor_info_id
data.Description: Returns the integer id of an actor by its string name

data.Name: query.get_animation_frame
data.Description: Returns the current texture of the item

data.Name: query.get_default_bone_pivot
data.Description: Gets specified axis of the specified bone orientation pivot

data.Name: query.get_equipped_item_name
data.Description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_item_name_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.) Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and a second parameter (0=default) if you would like the equipped item or any non-zero number for the currently rendered item, and returns the name of the item in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied) if there is one, otherwise returns ''.

data.Name: query.get_locator_offset
data.Description: Gets specified axis of the specified locator offset

data.Name: query.get_name
data.Description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_name_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.) Get the name of the mob if there is one, otherwise return ''.

data.Name: query.get_root_locator_offset
data.Description: Gets specified axis of the specified locator offset of the root model

data.Name: query.ground_speed
data.Description: Returns the ground speed of the entity in meters/second

data.Name: query.has_any_family
data.Description: Returns 1 if the entity has any of the specified families, else 0.

data.Name: query.has_armor_slot
data.Description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns 1.0 if the entity has armor in the requested slot, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.has_biome_tag
data.Description: Returns whether or not a Block Placement Target has a specific biome tag

data.Name: query.has_block_property
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the associated block has the given block property or 0.0 if not

data.Name: query.has_cape
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the player has a cape, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.has_collision
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has collisions enabled, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.has_gravity
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is affected by gravity, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.has_owner
data.Description: Returns true if the entity has an owner ID else it returns false

data.Name: query.has_rider
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has a rider, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.has_target
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has a target, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.head_roll_angle
data.Description: returns the roll angle of the head of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.head_x_rotation
data.Description: Takes one argument as a parameter.  Returns the nth head x rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.head_y_rotation
data.Description: Takes one argument as a parameter.  Returns the nth head y rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.health
data.Description: Returns the health of the entity, or 0.0 if it doesn't make sense to call on this entity.

data.Name: query.heightmap
data.Description: Queries Height Map

data.Name: query.hurt_direction
data.Description: returns the hurt direction for the actor, otherwise returns 0

data.Name: query.hurt_time
data.Description: returns the hurt time for the actor, otherwise returns 0

data.Name: query.in_range
data.Description: Requires 3 numerical arguments: some value, a minimum, and a maximum. If the first argument is between the minimum and maximum (inclusive), returns 1.0. Otherwise returns 0.0.

data.Name: query.invulnerable_ticks
data.Description: Returns the number of ticks of invulnerability the entity has left if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_admiring
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is admiring, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_alive
data.Description: returns 1.0 if the entity is alive, and 0.0 if it's dead

data.Name: query.is_angry
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is angry, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_attached_to_entity
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the actor is attached to an entity, else it will return 0.0

data.Name: query.is_avoiding_block
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is fleeing from a block, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_avoiding_mobs
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is fleeing from mobs, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_baby
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is a baby, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_breathing
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is breathing, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_bribed
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has been bribed, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_carrying_block
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is carrying a block, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_casting
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is casting, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_celebrating
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is celebrating, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_celebrating_special
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is doing a special celebration, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_charged
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is charged, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_charging
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is charging, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_chested
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has chests attached to it, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_critical
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is critical, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_croaking
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is croaking, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_dancing
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is dancing, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_delayed_attacking
data.Description: returns 1.0 if the entity is attacking using the delayed attack, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_eating
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is eating, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_eating_mob
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is eating a mob, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_elder
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is an elder version of it, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_emoting
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is emoting, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_enchanted
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is enchanted, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_fire_immune
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is immune to fire, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_first_person
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is being rendered in first person mode, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_ghost
data.Description: returns 1.0 if an entity is a ghost, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_gliding
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is gliding, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_grazing
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is grazing, or 0.0 if not

data.Name: query.is_idling
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is idling, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_ignited
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is ignited, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_illager_captain
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is an illager captain, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_in_contact_with_water
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in contact with any water (water, rain, splash water bottle), else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_in_love
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in love, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_in_ui
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is rendered as part of the UI, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_in_water
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in water, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_in_water_or_rain
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in water or rain, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_interested
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is interested, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_invisible
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is invisible, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_item_equipped
data.Description: takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if there is an item in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0.

data.Name: query.is_item_name_any
data.Description: Takes an equipment slot name (see the replaceitem command) and an optional slot index value. After that, takes one or more full name (with 'namespace:') strings to check for. Returns 1.0 if an item in the specified slot has any of the specified names, otherwise returns 0.0. An empty string '' can be specified to check for an empty slot. Note that querying slot.enderchest, slot.saddle, slot.armor, or slot.chest will only work in behavior packs. A preferred query to query.get_equipped_item_name, as it can be adjusted by Mojang to avoid breaking content if names are changed.

data.Name: query.is_jumping
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is jumping, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_laying_down
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is laying down, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_laying_egg
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is laying an egg, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_leashed
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is leashed to something, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_levitating
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is levitating, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_lingering
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is lingering, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_moving
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is moving, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_name_any
data.Description: Takes one or more arguments. If the entity's name is any of the specified string values, returns 1.0. Otherwise returns 0.0. A preferred query to query.get_name, as it can be adjusted by Mojang to avoid breaking content if names are changed.

data.Name: query.is_on_fire
data.Description: returns 1.0 if the entity is on fire, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_on_ground
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is on the ground, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_on_screen
data.Description: returns 1.0 if this is called on an entity at a time when it is known if it is on screen, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_onfire
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is on fire, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_orphaned
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is orphaned, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_owner_identifier_any
data.Description: Takes one or more arguments. Returns whether the root actor identifier is any of the specified strings. A preferred query to query.owner_identifier, as it can be adjusted by Mojang to avoid breaking content if names are changed.

data.Name: query.is_persona_or_premium_skin
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the player has a persona or premium skin, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_playing_dead
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is playing dead, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_powered
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is powered, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_pregnant
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is pregnant, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_ram_attacking
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is using a ram attack, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_resting
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is resting, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_riding
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is riding, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_roaring
data.Description: returns 1.0 if the entity is currently roaring, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_rolling
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is rolling, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_saddled
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has a saddle, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_scared
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is scared, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_selected_item
data.Description: returns true if the player has selected an item in the inventory, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_shaking
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is casting, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_shaking_wetness
data.Description: returns 1.0 if the entity is shaking water off, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_sheared
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is able to be sheared and is sheared, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_shield_powered
data.Description: Returns 1.0f if the entity has an active powered shield if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_silent
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is silent, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_sitting
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sitting, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_sleeping
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sleeping, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_sneaking
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sneaking, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_sneezing
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sneezing, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_sprinting
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sprinting, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_stackable
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is stackable, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_stalking
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is stalking, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_standing
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is standing, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_stunned
data.Description: returns 1.0 if the entity is currently stunned, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_swimming
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is swimming, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_tamed
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is tamed, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_transforming
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is transforming, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_using_item
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is using an item, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.is_wall_climbing
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is climbing a wall, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.item_in_use_duration
data.Description: Returns the amount of time an item has been in use in seconds up to the maximum duration, else 0.0 if it doesn't make sense

data.Name: query.item_is_charged
data.Description: takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if the item is charged in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0.

data.Name: query.item_max_use_duration
data.Description: Returns the maximum amount of time the item can be used, else 0.0 if it doesn't make sense

data.Name: query.item_remaining_use_duration
data.Description: Returns the amount of time an item has left to use, else 0.0 if it doesn't make sense. Item queried is specified by the slot name 'main_hand' or 'off_hand'. Time remaining is normalized using the normalization value, only if one is given, else it is returned in seconds.

data.Name: query.item_slot_to_bone_name
data.Description: query.item_slot_to_bone_name requires one parameter: the name of the equipment slot.  This function returns the name of the bone this entity has mapped to that slot.

data.Name: query.key_frame_lerp_time
data.Description: Returns the ratio between the previous and next key frames

data.Name: query.last_frame_time
data.Description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the last frame.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.last_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.last_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.last_frame_time(1)' will return the frame time of two frames ago.  Currently we store the history of the last 30 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Passing an index more than the available data will return the oldest frame stored.

data.Name: query.last_hit_by_player
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity was last hit by the player, else it returns 0.0. If called by the client always returns 0.0

data.Name: query.lie_amount
data.Description: Returns the lie down amount for the entity

data.Name: query.life_span
data.Description: returns the limited life span of an entity, or 0.0 if it lives forever

data.Name: query.life_time
data.Description: Returns the time in seconds since the current animation started, else 0.0 if not called within an animation

data.Name: query.lod_index
data.Description: Takes an array of distances and returns the zero - based index of which range the actor is in based on distance from the camera. For example, 'query.lod_index(10, 20, 30)' will return 0, 1, or 2 based on whether the mob is less than 10, 20, or 30 units away from the camera, or it will return 3 if it is greater than 30.

data.Name: query.log
data.Description: debug log a value to the content log

data.Name: query.main_hand_item_max_duration
data.Description: Returns the use time maximum duration for the main hand item if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.main_hand_item_use_duration
data.Description: Returns the use time for the main hand item.

data.Name: query.mark_variant
data.Description: Returns the entity's mark variant

data.Name: query.max_durability
data.Description: Returns the max durability an item can take

data.Name: query.max_health
data.Description: Returns the maximum health of the entity, or 0.0 if it doesn't make sense to call on this entity.

data.Name: query.max_trade_tier
data.Description: Returns the maximum trade tier of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.maximum_frame_time
data.Description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the most expensive frame over the last 'n' frames.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.maximum_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.maximum_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.maximum_frame_time(1)' will return the maximum frame time of the previous two frames.  Currently we store the history of the last 30 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Asking for more frames will result in only sampling the number of frames stored.

data.Name: query.minimum_frame_time
data.Description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the least expensive frame over the last 'n' frames.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.minimum_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.minimum_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.minimum_frame_time(1)' will return the minimum frame time of the previous two frames.  Currently we store the history of the last 30 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Asking for more frames will result in only sampling the number of frames stored.

data.Name: query.model_scale
data.Description: Returns the scale of the current entity

data.Name: query.modified_distance_moved
data.Description: Returns the total distance the entity has moved horizontally in meters (since the entity was last loaded, not necessarily since it was originally created) modified along the way by status flags such as is_baby or on_fire

data.Name: query.modified_move_speed
data.Description: Returns the current walk speed of the entity modified by status flags such as is_baby or on_fire

data.Name: query.moon_brightness
data.Description: Returns the brightness of the moon (FULL_MOON=1.0, WANING_GIBBOUS=0.75, FIRST_QUARTER=0.5, WANING_CRESCENT=0.25, NEW_MOON=0.0, WAXING_CRESCENT=0.25, LAST_QUARTER=0.5, WAXING_GIBBOUS=0.75).

data.Name: query.moon_phase
data.Description: Returns the phase of the moon (FULL_MOON=0, WANING_GIBBOUS=1, FIRST_QUARTER=2, WANING_CRESCENT=3, NEW_MOON=4, WAXING_CRESCENT=5, LAST_QUARTER=6, WAXING_GIBBOUS=7).

data.Name: query.movement_direction
data.Description: returns the specified axis of the normalized position delta of the entity

data.Name: query.noise
data.Description: Queries Perlin Noise Map

data.Name: query.on_fire_time
data.Description: returns the time that the entity is on fire, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.out_of_control
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is out of control, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.overlay_alpha
data.Description: DEPRECATED (Do not use - this function is deprecated and will be removed)

data.Name: query.owner_identifier
data.Description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_owner_identifier_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.) Returns the root actor identifier.

data.Name: query.player_level
data.Description: returns the players level if the actor is a player, otherwise returns 0

data.Name: query.position
data.Description: Returns the absolute position of an actor.  Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).

data.Name: query.position_delta
data.Description: Returns the position delta for an actor.  Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).

data.Name: query.previous_squish_value
data.Description: Returns the previous squish value for the current entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense

data.Name: query.remaining_durability
data.Description: Returns the how much durability an item has remaining

data.Name: query.roll_counter
data.Description: Returns the roll counter of the entity

data.Name: query.rotation_to_camera
data.Description: Returns the rotation required to aim at the camera.  Requires one argument representing the rotation axis you would like (0 for x, 1 for y)

data.Name: query.shake_angle
data.Description: returns the shaking angle of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.shake_time
data.Description: Returns the shake time of the entity.

data.Name: query.shield_blocking_bob
data.Description: Returns the how much the offhand shield should translate down when blocking and being hit.

data.Name: query.show_bottom
data.Description: Returns 1.0 if we render the entity's bottom, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.sit_amount
data.Description: Returns the current sit amount of the entity

data.Name: query.skin_id
data.Description: Returns the entity's skin ID

data.Name: query.sleep_rotation
data.Description: returns the rotation of the bed the player is sleeping on.

data.Name: query.sneeze_counter
data.Description: Returns the sneeze counter of the entity

data.Name: query.spellcolor
data.Description: Returns a struct representing the entity spell color for the specified entity. The struct contains '.r' '.g' '.b' and '.a' members, each 0.0 to 1.0. If no actor is specified, each member value will be 0.0

data.Name: query.standing_scale
data.Description: Returns the scale of how standing up the entity is

data.Name: query.structural_integrity
data.Description: returns the structural integrity for the actor, otherwise returns 0

data.Name: query.swell_amount
data.Description: Returns how swollen the entity is

data.Name: query.swelling_dir
data.Description: Returns the swelling direction of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.swim_amount
data.Description: Returns the amount the current entity is swimming

data.Name: query.tail_angle
data.Description: returns the angle of the tail of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.target_x_rotation
data.Description: Returns the x rotation required to aim at the entity's current target if it has one, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.target_y_rotation
data.Description: Returns the y rotation required to aim at the entity's current target if it has one, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.texture_frame_index
data.Description: Returns the icon index of the experience orb

data.Name: query.time_of_day
data.Description: Returns the time of day (midnight=0.0, sunrise=0.25, noon=0.5, sunset=0.75) of the dimension the entity is in.

data.Name: query.time_stamp
data.Description: Returns the current time stamp of the level

data.Name: query.total_emitter_count
data.Description: Returns the total number of active emitters in the world

data.Name: query.total_particle_count
data.Description: Returns the total number of active particles in the world

data.Name: query.trade_tier
data.Description: Returns the trade tier of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0

data.Name: query.unhappy_counter
data.Description: Returns how unhappy the entity is

data.Name: query.variant
data.Description: Returns the entity's variant index

data.Name: query.vertical_speed
data.Description: Returns the speed of the entity up or down in meters/second, where positive is up

data.Name: query.walk_distance
data.Description: Returns the walk distance of the entity.

data.Name: query.wing_flap_position
data.Description: Returns the wing flap position of the entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense

data.Name: query.wing_flap_speed
data.Description: Returns the wing flap speed of the entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense

data.Name: query.yaw_speed
data.Description: Returns the entity's yaw speed
